verses.name: Joshua 15:27
verses.text: And Hazar–gaddah, and Heshmon, and Beth–palet,

verses.name: Joshua 15:28
verses.text: And Hazar–shual, and Beer–sheba, and Bizjothjah,

verses.name: Joshua 15:30
verses.text: And Eltolad, and Chesil, and Hormah,

verses.name: Joshua 15:31
verses.text: And Ziklag, and Madmannah, and Sansannah,

verses.name: Joshua 15:32
verses.text: And Lebaoth, and Shilhim, and Ain, and Rimmon: all the cities are twenty and nine, with their villages:

verses.name: Joshua 15:33
verses.text: And in the valley, Eshtaol, and Zoreah, and Ashnah,

verses.name: Joshua 15:34
verses.text: And Zanoah, and En–gannim, Tappuah, and Enam,

verses.name: Joshua 15:35
verses.text: Jarmuth, and Adullam, Socoh, and Azekah,

verses.name: Joshua 15:36
verses.text: And Sharaim, and Adithaim, and Gederah, and Gederothaim; fourteen cities with their villages:

verses.name: Joshua 15:38
verses.text: And Dilean, and Mizpeh, and Joktheel,
